thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Hunt at Limpopo

author: news24.com
title: Hunt at Limpopo
text:
Why does your government allow hunting of any kind?You the South African peoples are having YOUR COUNTRY, YOUR HERITAGE being stripped from you. IN MONEY terms...where does the money go for a hunt?DO YOU GET IT...NO !!! IN MONEY TERMS EACH S.AFRICAN PERSON GETS less that 1/4 of a rand per hunt!!!! yet you loose the beautiful animal , you loose your dignity and you are loosing your freedom. This is NOT WHAT NELSON MANDELA fought for.
HUNTING brings in 2,240 million rand and yet NON HUNTING TOURISM brings in 102 BILLION rand per year ..if you continue with Trophy Hunting/ Canned Hunting/ Driven Hunting..we will make sure ALL support for South Africa in Tourism & Trade will be boycotted in favour of countries such as Botswana and Kenya that do NOT allow hunting.
MAKE HUNTING ILLEGAL and we will support you. Keep on with making hunting legal ..and we will NOT SUPPORT YOU..the choice is yours...So why do you not as individuals get up..and fight for your rights...write about it/ teach it in schools/ talk about it...1 person may be nothing ..but it can create a wave, a wave a tidal wave ..and you can win!!
